snippet: The deterioration came as the authorities announced that one more health care worker had been quarantined, in addition to three others who were isolated overnight.
lead_paragraph: The deterioration came as the authorities announced that one more health care worker had been quarantined, in addition to three others who were isolated overnight.

headline.main: Condition of Spanish Nurse With Ebola Worsens, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Condition of Spanish Nurse With Ebola Worsens, Officials Say
